description: A record representing the data known about an individual host
title: host

___seen_by.description: A list of sensor/scanner tuples that have witnessed this host's existance and have provided information about the host

___items.description: A record identifying an individual scanner that has seen this host and what sensor the service was running on.

___scanner.description: The program on the sensor that 'caught' this host, for example nmap or p0f

___sensor.description: UUID of the sensor the scanner was running on when this host was detected.

___first_seen.description: The first time this sensor/scanner combination saw this host

___last_seen.description: The last time this sensor/scanner combination saw this host

___type.description: This field indicates the type of record this is. Primarily needed when transferring scan data from a remote sensor to a collection hub.

___services.description: A list of services that have been detected running on this host

___vulnerabilities.description: The vulnerabilities that are known to exist for this service

vulnerability.description: Information about a single detected vulnerability on a host

___cve.description: The CVE identifier assigned to this vulnerability

___cwe.description: The common weakness enumeration specification identifier, used for classifying vulnerabilities into categories.

___exploitdb.description: The exploitDB vulnerability number if it's available

___metasploit_module.description: The name of the metasploit module known to exploit this vulnerability

___status.description: What the current status of this vulnerability is as far as we're concerned

___cvss.description: When available, this provides the CVSS scores assigned to this vulnerability.

___metadata.description: Additional information about this vulnerability that may be made available to us from a scanner but does not fit into the standard record.
Additional information provided by a scanner about this instance of this service that may not fall within the normal scope of a service record.

___id.description: A unique identifier for an individual host.

___metadata.description: Additional information about this host provided by scanner's that is outside the normal scope of a host record.

___hostnames.description: A list of all hostnames discovered associated directly with this address

___type.description: The kind of the network address being represented.
